description:
Just like Facebook, Twitter is a great place to advertise. Leveraging Twitter as a form of advertising is a basic necessity for any business wanting to increase sales.

Twitter advertising can bring you business leads, generate sales and help with branding. Twitter provides businesses with a number of methods to help maximize campaigns.

In this course, you'll learn the different ways you can advertise on Twitter, how to create a compelling Twitter ad and how to measure your success. We'll go through campaign setup and we'll talk about how you can target your ideal customer.

By the end of this course, you will have discovered how Twitter ads really work and the myriad of options available in order to excel at Twitter advertising.
title: Twitter Ads: How to Use Twitter Ads for More Leads and Sales
